description: Missing Person entity: Perheenjäsen (FamilyMember) - defined in §2 as spouse, cohabiting partner, and relatives in direct ascending/descending line living in same household
required_state: Person → FamilyMember entity with attributes for relationship type, household status

description: Survivor subclass 'Avopuoliso' (CohabitingPartner) is missing from ontology - entitled to widow's pension under specific conditions
current_state: Survivor only has Widow, Child, Dependent subclasses
required_state: Survivor → CohabitingPartner entity with attributes: shared household, cohabitation agreement, common child

description: Vahingoittunut (InjuredParty) definition incomplete - missing explicit link to §15 vahinkotapahtuma
current_state: Vahingoittunut defined as 'Person who suffered work accident or occupational disease'

description: Employer entity missing critical exemption status attributes: €1,200 threshold exemption and state employer exemption
required_state: Add: exemptionType (€1200_threshold | state_employer | none), exemptionStartDate

description: Employee entity missing insurance status attributes - employed vs uninsured work distinction

description: Missing attributes for PsychologicalShock subtypes: AcuteStressReaction, PTSD, PersonalityChange - and their temporal conditions

description: Missing explicit 'works_for' relation between Employee and Employer

description: Missing explicit inheritance relation for death compensation rights
